DOC.brief_summary: This drug-drug interaction study healthy volunteer evaluate potential pharmacokinetic ( PK ) effect non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug lesinurad leinurad non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug .
DOC.detailed_description: Naproxen indomethacin non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) use prophylactically prevention , treatment , acute gout flare . RDEA594-126 open-label study design ass potential effect multiple dose naproxen indomethacin single-dose PK lesinurad , assess potential effect multiple dose lesinurad multiple-dose PK naproxen indomethacin .
DOC.criteria: Subject body weight ≥ 50 kg ( 110 lb ) body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18 ≤ 30 kg/m2 . Subject free clinically significant disease require physician 's care and/or would interfere study evaluation procedure . Subject clinically relevant abnormality vital sign , ECG , physical examination safety laboratory value . Subject clinically significant pulmonary , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , neurologic , hepatic , renal , urological , psychiatric disorder . Subject history suspicion kidney stone . Subject history asthma . Subject undergone major surgery within 3 month prior Day 1 . Subject donate blood experienced significant blood loss ( > 450 mL ) within 12 week prior Day 1 give plasma donation within 4 week prior Screening visit . Subject inadequate venous access unsuitable vein repeat venipuncture .
